name: OUTDOOR INDUSTRY ASSOCIATION (OIA)
description: Nonprofit trade association representing business in the outdoor industry.
sampleDescriptions: Various policy issues impacting the outdoor industry, including but not limited to recreation policy, public lands, conservation, business, and trade.
